definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: fat tail of sheep, still accounted a delicacy in the East; (Mish. id. Targum, [[אַלְיְתָה]], [[אַלִּיתָא]], etc.; Ar. 0’alyah:, cf. Fl:TWB i. 418 a) Ex 29:22, Le 3:9, Le 7:3, Le 8:25 (all ‖[[חֵ֫לֶב]]); Le 9:19, prob. also 1Sa 9:24 for [[הֶעָלָיהָ]] v. Gei Dr (cf. Tristram:Nat. Hist. Bib. ch. vi Ri:HWB Schafe Smith:Dict. Bib. Sheep).
